__idx_info__: Used for determining a schema name (i.e., schema_name or use_cols): {db}_{idx}
__selectivity_info__: Selectivity threshold of added predicates (used in find_selective_predicates.py)
__rows_min_info__: The lower threshold of the number of rows in the table to which a predicate can be added (used in find_selective_predicates.py)

hyperparams.__num_column_info__: the number of sampled columns for each tables
